review.title: “Market laggard company in a great industry”
review.pros: Pros – Established player with excellent clients, wide ranging services, tremendous potential for becoming an end to end player in information security
review.cons: Cons – Requires clear strategy, focus on competitive advantages & develop clear market positioning
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Lack of proper support and vision.”
review.pros: Pros – Well established clients, projects, especially in the area of DLP.
review.cons: Cons – Lack of proper vision and strategy for future, bad HR policies, delayed salary. One of the first Info Sec companies in India but totally lack the direction.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Listen to employee feedback, come up with better office & HR policies.
